title: The Built-up amenity shall be in the form of the activity related to the public entertainment as decided by the Commissioner such as Opera theater/Mini-theater/Production studio for cinema & or Tele- serial/Dubbing & Recording studio/ Preview theater
clause_text: The Built-up amenity shall be in the form of the activity related to the public entertainment as decided by the Commissioner such as Opera theater/Mini-theater/Production studio for cinema & or Tele- serial/Dubbing & Recording studio/ Preview theater. In case of plots up to 2000 sq. m, such activity shall preferably be located in a separate wing and with the separate access.
